Description: Stump of a light brown, palm strip brush;constructed by tying narrow, palm strips into a bundle then turning whole over itself; the stump is divided into four branches; bound at the end where the strips are reversed by a 2 ply S palm fibre cord (dia. 3mm); cord is wrapped around twive then moves up to wrap the first branch and moves along to wrap the rest; the cord is tied around each branch twice.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), EC1-27, fill EC1-237-H
